availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ludwell Owen Hinson (Mason County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Served in the 2nd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry as private from February 13, 1862, to July 17, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 61, 438.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 297.
Find A Grave, "Ludwell O. Hinson (May 28, 1838-January 16, 1918)," Memorial #23256555, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/23256555 (accessed February 21, 2019).
